main event: An object was first observed as a round, flaking light with a red tail traveling from west to east before breaking into smaller parts and disintegrating.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 20 minutes,The object left trailing smoke and made a traveling noise,It broke into many smaller parts traveling north-northwest at high speed,The object appeared to disintegrate after a few minutes,This sighting was reported at a specific date and time.
sighted object: a round, flaking light with a red tail
